seniority_level.evidence: Title mentions 'Data Engineer' without seniority qualifiers, and years of experience stated as 3-5 years

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines and ingestion

sub_specialty.evidence: SFTP-related tasks include real-time aspects like file monitoring and timely delivery, though not heavily emphasized

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities focus on maintenance, scripting, and troubleshooting without explicit leadership or mentoring duties

primary_cloud.evidence: Azure Cloud is listed as a must-have skill, while AWS and GCP are nice-to-have

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS and GCP are mentioned as nice-to-have skills

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions automated SFTP data transfers and period software updates, implying both batch and real-time processing

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrator tools like Airflow, Luigi, or cloud-native orchestrators explicitly mentioned

storage_layer.evidence: No explicit mention of storage layers like warehouse, lake, or lakehouse

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Cincinnati, OH without remote work mention, implying regional presence required

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation package or requirement explicitly stated, and location is specified without remote options

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned in Pass 1 extraction

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of OPT/CPT or student visa support, and 'Minimum (3-5) years related work experience' suggests work authorization required

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization text provided in Pass 1

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type stated as full-time and contract type as permanent

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in Pass 1 extraction

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit or implied career growth paths mentioned in the job posting

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mention of mentorship or working with senior engineers beyond typical collaboration

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion or advancement keywords found in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility or role changes in the job posting

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks or paths mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Multiple must-have skills listed with clear emphasis on required experience

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses on specific SFTP and data engineering tasks, well-defined responsibilities

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Must-have skills align reasonably with 3-5 years of experience for a mid-level role
